arguments.description:
there are different sort types:
			- numeric (sort by number)
			- text (sorts text alphabetically and case sensitive)
			- textnocase (sorts text alphabetically and ignore case sensitivity)
arguments.name: sort_type

arguments.description:
sort direction:
			- asc(default): ascending sort order
			- desc: descending sort order
arguments.name: sort_order

arguments.description: Characters that separate list elements. The default value is comma.
arguments.name: delimiters

arguments.description: if set to true, empty values are included as well
arguments.name: includeEmptyFields

description: Sorts list elements according to a sort type and sort order.
name: listsort
